movies.title: The Damned
movies.plot: The film is the story of a search undertaken by the Czech tourist guide Tomás Egermaier, who had become a chance witness to his countryman Patrik Lovický's arrest for holding drugs in the (fictitious) Asian town of Bandung. Tomás starts investigating the young man's past and the events that finally led to this long prison sentence. A story about the cruel fate that can hit anyone who considers drug smuggling from Asia an easy way of getting rich quickly, it was inspired by the true stories of young people who fell into this trap, were arrested and imprisoned. The Damned is also the first film on the subject of drugs that the Kingdom of Thailand officially permitted to be filmed on its territory.

biography.bio: Jan Plouhar is an actor, known for The Damned (2002), Brak (2002) and Tajemství Lesní zeme (2006).
biography.name: Jan Plouhar

biography.bio: Jan Révai was born on February 11, 1974 in Kladno, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for Blade II (2002), Gympl s (r)ucením omezeným (2012) and Rebels (2001). He was previously married to Daniela Urbánková-Révai.
biography.name: Jan Révai

biography.bio: Isabela Bencová is an actress, known for One Hand Can't Clap (2003) and The Damned (2002).
biography.name: Isabela Bencová

biography.bio: Dana Vávrová was born on August 9, 1967 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. She was an actress and director, known for Stalingrad (1993), Amadeus (1984) and Frère sommeil (1995). She was married to Joseph Vilsmaier. She died on February 5, 2009 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Dana Vávrová

biography.bio: John Comer was born on December 8, 1960 in Galway, Ireland. He is an actor, known for EuroTrip (2004), Man on a Ledge (2012) and Pride and Glory (2008).
biography.name: John Comer

biography.bio: Dennis Rudge is an actor, known for Simon (2004), Helium (2014) and Bon Bini Holland (2015).
biography.name: Dennis Rudge

biography.bio: Erdem Bileg is an actor, known for The Damned (2002).
biography.name: Erdem Bileg

biography.bio: Rob Das was born on May 12, 1969 in Delft, Zuid-Holland, Netherlands. He is an actor and assistant director, known for Anne Frank (2001), Eveline (1995) and De fiets (1997).
biography.name: Rob Das

biography.bio: Michaela Kuklová was born on April 8, 1968 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. She is an actress, known for Ordinace v ruzové zahrade 2 (2008), Andelská tvár (2002) and Helluva Good Luck (1999). She was previously married to Jirí Pomeje.
biography.name: Michaela Kuklová

biography.bio: Borek Sípek was born on June 14, 1949 in Prague, Czechoslovakia as Borivoj Sipek. He was an actor and art director, known for The Damned (2002), 13. komnata (2006) and Uvolnete se, prosím (2004). He died on February 13, 2016 in Prague, Czech Republic.
biography.name: Borek Sípek

biography.bio: Filip Rajmont was born on September 9, 1977 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for Nováci (1995), Ulice (2005) and Boredom in Brno (2003).
biography.name: Filip Rajmont

biography.bio: Jaroslava Obermaierová was born on April 10, 1946 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. She is an actress, known for Ulice (2005), Happy End (1967) and Ulysses and the Stars (1976).
biography.name: Jaroslava Obermaierová

biography.bio: Zuzana Stalmachová is an actress, known for The Damned (2002), Kamenák (2003) and Kamenák 3 (2005).
biography.name: Zuzana Stalmachová

biography.bio: Pavla Tomicová was born on June 25, 1962 in Karviná, Czechoslovakia. She is an actress, known for Ulice (2005), Boredom in Brno (2003) and Gympl s (r)ucením omezeným (2012).
biography.name: Pavla Tomicová

biography.bio: Roger Denesha is an actor and producer, known for EuroTrip (2004), Andel (2004) and Hitler - La naissance du mal (2003).
biography.name: Roger Denesha
